# SCNErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

Identifies an error type defined by the SceneKit framework.

## Declaration

```swift
let SCNErrorDomain: String
```

## Handling Shader Compilation Errors

- **program(_:handleError:)**: Tells the delegate that an error occurred when compiling GLSL source code.
- **SceneKit Error Codes**

items.description: Tells the delegate that an error occurred when compiling GLSL source code.
items.name: program(_:handleError:)
